english.segment1: Well I would die tonight. To see your face. And I would die tonight. To see your grace " Your grace
english.segment2: How can I open up. All your love. And come to see you. I can see. I can see, I can see
english.segment3: And I would cry tonight. To see your love. And I would cry tonight. To feel your blood " Your blood
english.segment4: How can I open up. All your love. And come to see you. I can see. I can see, I can see. All your love
